alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:29PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 400 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Superior, which is also 27 miles northeast of Rock Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Southwest Wyoming Regional Airport and Point Of Rocks. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 113 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range
